description: Morgan Black looks and acts like a cop, but today we have him trying on his best suit and modeling in it for the camera. He's joined by Shane Frost, and when we got these two guys in the same room we let their chemistry take control. There's something about Morgan's masculine and controlling look that might give you the impression he's a total top, but he's rather submissive. It doesn't take much coaxing for him to get on his back and take Shane's cock like a champ!
title: Morgan Black Bottoms for Shane Frost in a Suit
